With people who live away from family and friends unable to spend physical time together at the moment, the BBC has launched a new feature for iPlayer to make things a bit more social.

articles.title: Israel Kamakawiwoʻole: Hawaiian musician celebrated by Google Doodle on 61st birthday - The Independent
articles.description: Doodle ties in with Asian Pacific American Heritage Month
articles.content:
Google is celebrating the birthday of Israel Kamakawiwoole with a cartoon of the late native Hawaiian musician.
The Doodle sees an animated Kamakawiwoole perform his ukulele rendition of Somewhere Over The Rainbow, a song that has featured in multiple films … [+1067 chars]

articles.title: BBC Confirms It Is Considering Restoring BBC Three To Television - Deadline

articles.title: George Lucas altered the ending of Empire Strikes Back after it was already in cinemas - GamesRadar+
articles.description: Lucas felt the original ending wasn't as clear as it could've been
articles.content: When Star Wars: Empire Strikes Back first premiered in 1980, the ending was slightly different than what we see today. That's because, after an early public screening, the series' creator George Lucas came away feeling that the ending wasn't as crystal clear … [+1902 chars]

articles.title: Justin Bieber enlists stars including Kylie Jenner and Ariana Grande to wish Jazmyn happy birthday - Daily Mail
articles.description: Justin Bieber rounded up some of the world's biggest stars to send wishes to his little sister Jazmyn on her 12th birthday. Stars included The Smith Family, Jenner sisters and Ariana Grande.
articles.content:
He has been isolating at his home in Canada with wife Hailey Baldwin over the past few months.  
And Justin Bieber's visit home meant he was there to celebrate his sister Jazmyn's 12th birthday on Tuesday.  
And rather than buy a present, the 26-year-old wi… [+2591 chars]

articles.title: ‘Twilight’ actor Gregory Tyree Boyce has died - NME
articles.description: Gregory Tyree Boyce, who played Tyler Crowley in 'Twilight', has died. Police found Boyce and his girlfriend Natalie Adepoju dead in a Las Vegas condominium
articles.content:
Twilight actor Gregory Tyree Boyce has died, aged 30.
Boyce and his girlfriend Natalie Adepoju were found dead by police in a Las Vegas condominium last Wednesday (May 13).
Their cause of death is pending toxicology results, although police have ruled that … [+1055 chars]
